title: 服务器又崩了
txt_content:
然而崩溃信息只有这么点- -

replies.author: 伊藤布哥
replies.txt_content:
你這電腦應該是新的吧?
你尚未安裝 Visual C++ 2008 Redistributable:

 for 32 bit: http://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/download/details.aspx?id=29
 for 64 bit: http://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/download/details.aspx?id=15336
